description:
The Pedroc PTX is designed for moving fast in and training for the mountains. It’s a lightweight, versatile and protective technical shoe that delivers the goods both in mixed mountain and urban scenarios. For additional waterproof protection and enhanced breathabilty performance, it’s equipped with a lightweight, durable and sustainable Powertex® membrane.

To protect feet in rugged terrain, the strong ripstop mesh upper and TPU rand offer high abrasion resistance, while the integrated SALEWA® 3F system improves support and stability, even on edgy surfaces.

Underfoot, the Pomoca™ Speed Hiker Pro outsole has a tread that works well on mud, grass and rock, offering the optimal combination of stability, adaptability and traction thanks to its lug geometry and S-Path Technology, while the cushioning EVA midsole delivers optimal rebound and comfort.

The Pedroc PTX is a SALEWA® Committed product manufactured according to independently-audited environmental and social responsibility standards with a PFC-free, water-repellent membrane.

Our versatile, adaptable and protective speed hiking shoe.
name: Salewa Pedroc PTX - Mens
